item.title: Army saw spike in deadly aviation accidents in year before DC plane crash disaster
item.description: Wednesday's deadly collision involving a U.S. Army Black Hawk helicopter outside Washington, D.C., followed the Army's highest rate of flight mishaps ...

item.title: Secretary of State Rubio confirms becoming acting USAID chief
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said he is now acting director of the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) while on a trip to El Salvador.

item.title: GOP hardliners rally around Trump, Musk scaling back USAID
item.description: Conservatives in the House GOP's right flank are cheering President Donald Trump and Elon Musk's crackdown on USAID.
